title: In Balance Holistic Health - Classical Homeopathy - Acupuncture
description: Dr. Laurenne Burger DAOM, L.Ac, DIHOM, CCH founder of In Balance Holistic Health, is dedicated to helping her clients achieve the best health possible. cleaned_text: In Balance Holistic Health Classical Homeopathy Classical Homeopathy calls upon the body's innate defense system to support more internal balance and aid in more profound healing and repair. In Balance Holistic Health is dedicated to providing the best care possible in a gentle yet effective manner to help you shift toward more optimal health.
